name: Refugee's Logbook
description: This weathered logbook details the endeavors and demise of an Iron Legion warband. A refugee in Lion's Arch might want it back.

name: Guild Weapon Stations
description: Spawns field crafting stations for weaponsmith, huntsman, artificer, and chef. Lasts for 1 hour.

name: Miniature Red Siege Golem
description: Double-click to summon this miniature to follow you around. Only one miniature may be in use at a time.

name: Guild Heroes Banner
description: Spawns a guild banner that will give +10% karma, +15% magic find, +10% experience from kills, +10% gold from kills, +10% increased movement speed, and +15% gathering chance to any ally that touches it for 30 minutes. Does not stack with other banner boosts.

name: Refugee's Ship in a Bottle
description: A hand-crafted ship within a surprisingly spotless bottle. Etched into the boat's side is a tribute to the Spirits of the Wild. A refugee in Lion's Arch might want this back.

name: Miniature Green Siege Golem
description: Double-click to summon this miniature to follow you around. Only one miniature may be in use at a time.

name: Endless Guild Banner Tonic
description: Transform into your guild's banner for 15 minutes or until hit. You cannot move while transformed.

name: Refugee's Compass
description: Silhouettes of the four Spirits of the Wild are masterfully carved into this compass's lid. A refugee in Lion's Arch might want it back.

name: Guild Gathering and Swiftness Banner
description: Spawns a guild banner that will give +15% gathering chance and 10% movement speed boost for 30 minutes to any ally who touches it. Does not stack with other gathering or speed banners.

name: Miniature Blue Siege Golem
description: Double-click to summon this miniature to follow you around. Only one miniature may be in use at a time.

name: Guild Gold from Kills Banner
description: Spawns a guild banner that will give +5% boost to gold earned from monster kills for 30 minutes to any ally who touches it. Does not stack with other gold banners.

name: Bauble
description: Spend these in shops inside the Super Adventure Box.

name: Match Win Reward Chest
description: Double-click to receive your PvP rewards.

name: Refugee's Goblet
description: This enormous goblet, stained with countless shades of ale, belongs to a refugee in Lion's Arch. They might want it back.

name: Guild Trebuchet Blueprints
description: Use to construct a guild trebuchet build site. It is more powerful than a standard trebuchet and displays your guild emblem. Range 10,000. Requires 100 supplies to complete.

name: Guild Gold and Magic Find Banner
description: Spawns a guild banner that will give +10% boost to gold from kills and +15% boost to magic find for 30 minutes to any ally who touches it. Does not stack with other gold or magic find banners.

name: Refugee's Wooden Soldier
description: This wooden toy, crafted to resemble Toymaker Tixx's Wintersday soldiers, looks well-loved. A refugee in Lion's Arch might want it back.

name: Guild Arrow Cart Blueprints
description: Use to construct a guild arrow cart build site. It is more powerful than a standard arrow cart and displays your guild emblem. Range 2,500. Requires 40 supply to complete.

name: Refugee's Sword Belt
description: This sturdy sword belt has notches carved into its leather to track kills. A refugee in Lion's Arch might want it back.

name: Guild Karma and Experience Banner
description: Spawns a guild banner that will give +10% karma and +10% experience from kills boost for 30 minutes to any ally who touches it. Does not stack with other karma or experience banners.
